briefTitle: Long-term Extension Study of SM-13496 (Lurasidone HCl) in Patients With Schizophrenia
officialTitle: Long-term Extension Study of SM-13496 (Lurasidone HCl) in Patients With Schizophrenia <Phase 3>
summary: The study evaluates the long term safety and efficacy of SM-13496 in patients with schizophrenia.

primaryOutcome.measure: Change From Baseline in the Positive and Negative Syndrome Scale (PANSS) Total Score at LOCF Endpoint
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: DB baseline and up to 32 weeks (LOCF endpoint)
